<br /><br />

<h4 class="f16">震后求生17天！甘宇是史上遇难求生纪录第一人吗？</h4>

<br><div class="tips" style="width:auto"><SCRIPT LANGUAGE="JavaScript">spinit();</SCRIPT></div><div class="c"></div>

<br /><div class="tpc_content do_not_catch" id="conttpc">鲁滨逊漂流的故事，大家应该都听过。但这是虚构的文学创作，如果真的有人落难荒野或者大海，能坚持多少天？<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_002394678abfd34c206.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_003b88a6b96a60b65a5.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_004762659bc597c24c2.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_005a8eddc45a55a2aaa.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_006e62bbe5b730c946d.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_007a6263c0e429f516e.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_00826fefc8e09672f0a.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_009af83a552afe0db25.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_010fadbbfae72be9bae.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_011d630b2fce148493d.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_012b6427994a236c145.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_01312ffca14496682b8.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_01430a2f9d2bc8846f7.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_015da9ca09b37d7320a.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_016763398d9e47caaa0.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_017be4d1eb30ac4abbc.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_018fe8f89c3bca40559.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_019dd9387449323c88c.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s4.gifyu.com/images/pic_020d972f89b2a5e6d38.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_021e70e65284da7f68c.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_02260c1eb2d6854b0ca.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_023c4ec923bb3a29bea.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://s1.gifyu.com/images/pic_02413d67078c0e803ce.jpg'>&nbsp;<br><br>【参考资料】<br>1、红星新闻 《甘宇讲述17天自救逃生经历：地震时丢了500度眼镜》.2022<br>2、新民晚报 《失联17天后获救，甘宇哭着说遇到好人了》.2022<br>3、每日电讯报&nbsp; 《二战本洛蒙德号沉没的唯一幸存者潘林创造了在海上漂流133天的记录》.2014<br>4、国家地理 《在飞机失事和同类相食之后——充满希望的生活》.2016<br>5、history历史频道 《安第斯山脉的奇迹》.2015<br>6、国家地理 纪录片《绝处逢生：1972年乌拉圭橄榄球队空难》.2008<br>7、中新网 《萨尔瓦多男子太平洋漂流记成疑 专家验证真实性 》.2014

<script>
var charset='gbk';
var imgpath='images';
var stylepath='wind';

$('.sptable_do_not_remove h4:eq(0)').append('<span class=serdta></span>');
$(document).ready(function(){
	r9aeadS();
	$('img[ess-data]').each(function(){
		if($(this).attr('ess-data').indexOf('sinaimg')>0){
			$(this).attr('ess-data', $(this).attr('ess-data').replace(/https:/, "http:"));
		}
		$(this).attr('src', $(this).attr('ess-data'));
		$(this).css('cursor', 'pointer');
		$(this).on('load', function(){checkBigImage($(this))});
		$(this).click(function(){
			window.open('https://2023.redircdn.com/?action=image&url='+encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-link'))+'&src='+encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('src')));
			return false;
		});
	});
});

function adhtml(tpcHtml){
	$('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(tpcHtml);
}

function r9aeadS(){
	// v20211210 Blocking ads will cause your filters to be targeted and being followed by our technical department, resulting in the inability to display content
	var blockText = '去广告插件屏蔽, 请等待10秒, 或将其关闭即刻恢复浏览';
	if($('.sptable_do_not_remove td').css('display')=='none' || $('.tips').css('display')=='none' || $('.tips').css('height')=='0px' || $('.tips').css('height')=='1px' || $('.tips').css('visibility')=='hidden'){
		var tpcHtml = '';
		setTimeout(function(){ tpcHtml = $('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(); $('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(blockText); }, 1006);
		setTimeout(function(){ adhtml(tpcHtml); }, 10006);
	}
}
</script>
<script src="//2023.redircdn.com/web/images//post.js?v=1"></script>
